  • Constructor Details

    • Orb

      public Orb(city.cs.engine.World world, Game game, int x, int y)
      Initialise a new power-up orb.

      loads in the orb image, sets its position and adds a collision listener.

      Parameters:
      world - world in which the game is in
      game - game in which the player is in
      x - x coordinate of the orb position
      y - y coordinate of the orb position

  • Method Details

    • collide

      public void collide(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent DynamicBody)
      collision method.

      if the orb comes in contact with the player, the player increases their speed to seven. the sounds are also played and powerUp is set to true

      Specified by:
      collide in interface city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
      Parameters:
      DynamicBody - The CollisionEvent contains details about the collision.

    • isCollected

      public boolean isCollected()
      Getter method for the collection of the orb.

      This is used when saving if the orb has been collected or not

      Returns:
      collected to track if orb collected

    • setCollected

      public void setCollected(boolean collected)
      Setter method for the collection of the orb.

      This is used when saving if the orb has been collected or not

      Parameters:
      collected - to track if orb collected
